## üéØ **About Me**


class FullStackDeveloper:
    def __init__(self):
        self.name = "Musaddiq Ahmed"
        self.title = "Full Stack Developer"
        self.experience = "5+ Years"
        self.location = "DHA Phase 1, Karachi"
        self.passion = "Building scalable applications with AI integration"
        self.status = "üöÄ Available for exciting projects"
    
    def skills(self):
        return {
            "backend": ["Python", "PHP", "Node.js", "Laravel", "Django", "FastAPI", "Flask"],
            "frontend": ["React.js", "Next.js", "Vue.js", "JavaScript", "TypeScript", "Vite.js"],
            "ai_ml": ["TensorFlow", "OpenAI APIs", "LLMs", "Pandas", "NumPy", "Computer Vision"],
            "databases": ["MySQL", "SQLite", "MongoDB", "PostgreSQL", "Redis"],
            "desktop_apps": ["Tkinter", "CustomTkinter", "PyQt", "PySide"],
            "tools": ["Git", "Docker", "AWS", "Azure", "Agile/Scrum", "RESTful APIs"]
        }
    
    def current_focus(self):
        return "Building AI-powered web applications and scalable systems"
    
    def say_hello(self):
        return "üöÄ Turning complex ideas into elegant solutions through code!"

# Instantiate
dev = FullStackDeveloper()
